description: Retrieve annotations for a data quality statistic.

parameters.name: TimestampFilter
parameters.description: A timestamp filter. RecordedBefore (datetime) --- The timestamp before which statistics should be included in the results. RecordedAfter (datetime) --- The timestamp after which statistics should be included in the results.

nested_params.name: RecordedBefore
nested_params.description: The timestamp before which statistics should be included in the results.

nested_params.name: RecordedAfter
nested_params.description: The timestamp after which statistics should be included in the results.

nested_items.name: Annotations
nested_items.description: A list of StatisticAnnotation applied to the Statistic.

nested_items.name: StatisticRecordedOn
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the annotated statistic was recorded.

nested_items.name: InclusionAnnotation
nested_items.description: The inclusion annotation applied to the statistic.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the inclusion annotation was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token to retrieve the next set of results.
